data.title: Greg Davis
data.meta_description: DEIB Taskforce Committee Member and Senior National Account Manager, BH Technologies Mr. National Account Manager in the National Strategic Accounts Division of Beacon Hill Technologies based out of…
data.text:
DEIB Taskforce Committee Member and Senior National Account Manager, BH Technologies

Mr. Davis is a Sr. National Account Manager in the National Strategic Accounts Division of Beacon Hill Technologies based out of Denver, Colorado. He is responsible for overseeing our organization’s national partnership with one of Beacon Hill’s largest clients. Mr. Davis has worked the entirety of his decade-long career in the staffing and technology services business. While starting out his career as a recruiter, he transitioned into Account Management within his first year in the workforce. He supported a wide variety of clients across multiple industries before shifting his focus to enterprise-level clients. Mr. Davis excels in partnering with large organizations and was awarded Presidents Club honors as an Account Manager before transitioning into a leadership capacity. In more recent years his focus has become establishing a strategy nationwide to provide cohesive support for large clients. Mr. Davis prides himself on developing long-standing relationships with both his clients and internal partners.

Mr. Davis grew up in a southern suburb of Atlanta, GA, and attended The University of Notre Dame on a Track and Field scholarship. He was a four-year letterman and earned a Bachelor’s degree in Accounting from the Mendoza College of Business. Mr. Davis is committed to listening, learning and taking action to make both Beacon Hill and his clients a more inclusive and diverse environment. Outside of work, with his wife and two young children, Mr. Davis enjoys mountain biking, skiing, camping and hiking along with everything else the Colorado outdoors has to offer. He also coaches youth soccer.
